title: Resident Evil 2 Japanese 2006 release [English][Win7/8][No Bugs]
description:
This is the 2006 Japanese re-release of Resident Evil 2 by SourceNext.
This version came in Japan only, and brought lots of improvements over the original RE2 release on PC.

-Better quality FMV
-Better compatibility with newer hardware/OS
-No more savefile bugs
-No need of graphical configuration to get rid of graphical glitches
-Graphics, sound, saves and everything works perfectly without issues on modern PCs.

This game was japanese-only, but I've applied a patch and exchanged some files from the original EN-US release and it's now fully in >english
